text: Florence Agnes Henderson (February 14, 1934 - November 24, 2016) was an American actress and singer. She starred as Carol Brady in The Brady Bunch between 1969 and 1974. She was hosting her own talk show, The Florence Henderson Show, on television. Henderson died suddenly of heart failure at a hospital in Los Angeles, California on November 24, 2016, aged 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Television talk show hosts Category:Actors from Indiana Category:Singers from Indiana Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths
title: Florence Henderson
